  • Uses of UserProfileModel in Models

    Methods in Models that return UserProfileModel
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    UserProfileModel[] EnvironmentModel.getAllUserProfiles()
    Returns a deep copy of all the registered user profiles
    UserProfileModel EnvironmentModel.getCurrentUser()
    Returns a deep copy of the currently selected user on the simulation
    UserProfileModel[] EnvironmentModel.getProfilesByCategory​(ProfileType desiredProfileType)
    Returns an array of all the userprofiles that match the specified desiredProfileType
    UserProfileModel EnvironmentModel.getUserByID​(UUID id)
    Get a copy of a UserProfileModel with the specified UUID
    Methods in Models that return types with arguments of type UserProfileModel
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    ArrayList<UserProfileModel> Room.getAllUsersInRoom​(EnvironmentModel environment)
    Returns which users are located in the room represented by this instance of Room.
    Methods in Models with parameters of type UserProfileModel
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void EnvironmentModel.addUserProfile​(UserProfileModel newUser, File userProfilesFile)
    Adds a new UserProfileModel to the internal List of this class
    static EnvironmentModel EnvironmentModel.createSimulation​(House h, HouseGraphic hg, UserProfileModel... profiles)
    Initializes an EnvironmentModel and ensures that only 1 instance of this class exists during runtime
    void EnvironmentModel.editProfileName​(UserProfileModel profile, String newName, File file)
    Modifies the profile name of the specified user.
    void EnvironmentModel.modifyProfileLocation​(UserProfileModel profile, Room room)
    Modifies the room location of the specified user.
    void EnvironmentModel.removeUserProfile​(UserProfileModel u, File userProfilesFile)
    Remove the inputted user profile from the list.
    void EnvironmentModel.setCurrentUser​(UserProfileModel currentUser)
    Sets current user.
    Constructors in Models with parameters of type UserProfileModel
    Constructor Description
    UserProfileModel​(UserProfileModel original)
    Copy constructor used to generate deep copies
